set_limits_important_note: Once set, limits cannot be changed by you. Only support can remove them.
set_limits_stake_per_bet_desc: Set a maximum amount you can bet on any single bet
set_limits_stake_per_bet_locked: Stake per bet limit is already set. Contact support to remove it.
set_limits_deposit_limit_desc: Set a maximum amount you can deposit (operator decides enforcement window)
set_limits_deposit_limit_locked: Deposit limit is already set. Contact support to remove it.
set_limits_bet_count_desc: Limit the NUMBER of bets you can place (not the amount)
set_limits_bet_count_locked: Bet count limit is already set. Contact support to remove it.
set_limits_session_break_desc: Take forced breaks during play to avoid gambling fatigue
set_limits_session_break_locked: Session break is already set. Contact support to remove it.
set_limits_session_break_example: Example: 5 minutes break every 60 minutes of play
set_limits_night_curfew_desc: Block access during specific hours every night (e.g., ensure proper sleep)
set_limits_night_curfew_locked: Night curfew is already set. Contact support to remove it.
set_limits_night_curfew_example: Example: 02:00 to 06:00 = No play between 2 AM and 6 AM every night
set_limits_timeout_desc: Take a short break from gambling. Your account will be locked temporarily.
set_limits_timeout_active_until: Time-out is active until {date}. Wait for it to expire.
set_limits_timeout_expired: Time-out has expired. You can set a new one.
set_limits_timeout_self_exclusion_messag: A self-exclusion is currently active, so a time-out is covered automatically. Contact support or wait until the self-exclusion ends to set a shorter lock-out.
Self-exclusion is selected. A time-out isn't needed because the longer lock will apply.
set_limits_timeout_warning: Your account will be locked for this duration. This cannot be undone.
set_limits_self_exclusion_desc: Permanently or long-term block your account. This is for serious situations.
set_limits_self_exclusion_permanent: You are permanently self-excluded. Contact support to reactivate.
set_limits_self_exclusion_active_until: Self-exclusion active until {date}. Contact support for early reactivation.
set_limits_self_exclusion_expired: Self-exclusion has expired. You can set a new one.
set_limits_self_exclusion_warning: WARNING: Self-exclusion cannot be reversed. You'll need to contact support.
set_limits_self_exclusion_timeout_messag: A time-out is currently running. If you continue with self-exclusion, the time-out will be removed and replaced by the longer lock.
set_limits_alert_timeout_replace: Activating a time-out will disable your self-exclusion. Continue only if you want to replace the longer lock.
set_limits_alert_self_exclusion_replace: Activating a self-exclusion will disable any existing time-out. Continue only if you want the longer lock instead.
set_limits_alert_controls_locked:
These limits are now locked and cannot be changed.
Contact support to remove them.
set_limits_error_failed: Failed to set limits. Please try again.
my_limits_error_load_failed: Failed to load limits. Please try again.
my_limits_no_limits_description: You haven't set any responsible gaming controls yet. Set limits to protect yourself and stay in control.
my_limits_status_timeout_description: You cannot access gambling services until your time-out period ends.
my_limits_status_self_excluded_descripti: You cannot access gambling services. Contact support for assistance.
my_limits_status_curfew_description: Gambling access is blocked during your configured curfew hours.
